price: Na Yε nnyaa efie biara gyesε (efie) baako pε na na εyε Muslimifoͻ (fie).
arabic: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: famā wajadnā fīhā ghayra baytin mina al-mus'limīna
